features: Bare Bars Molten Lather the epitome of natural luxury in men's skincare Crafted with an unwavering commitment to genuine natural ingredients Bare Bar sets itself apart from the crowded skincare industry by delivering the true essence of nature to your daily grooming routine Our Molten Lather soap bar is a Heavy Grit Handcrafted Exfoliating Cold Process designed exclusively for men who seek an unparalleled shower experience

Immerse yourself in the rich blend of skin nourishing oils and butters that form the backbone of our natural soap bar With a careful selection of ingredients like Olive Oil Sustainable Palm Oil Coconut Oil and Cocoa Butter our Vegan Plastic Free and Cruelty Free product ensures not just a cleansing but also a deeply nourishing encounter with nature

The Molten Lather experience goes beyond mere cleansing it's a journey into the earthy smoky depths of a Primordial Musk The essential oil blend of Vetiver Clove Bergamot and Lime creates a winning aroma that leaves a lasting impression The Heavy Exfoliating Bar enriched with Volcanic Pumice and Activated Charcoal stands as a testament to our commitment to quality skincare These natural ingredients work in harmony to eliminate dead skin and draw out impurities providing an invigorating and luxurious shower experience

Our commitment to crafting an organic soap that stands out is rooted in the meticulous selection of ingredients With a base recipe consisting of Olive Oil Sustainable Palm Oil Coconut Oil and Cocoa Butter Bare Bar ensures a handmade soap that is not only environmentally conscious but also deeply nourishing for your skin The Heavy Exfoliating Bar is a testament to our dedication to quality and authenticity providing a luxurious shower experience that goes beyond ordinary body soap for men

Handcrafted in the UK using the age old Cold Process soap making technique our bars are meticulously cut by hand and air cured for five weeks, Embrace the Bare Bar difference Elevate your grooming routine with Molten Lather
description: Product Description Bare Bar products! Our passion for genuinely natural ingredients to use within our products is an obsession. The word 'Natural' is abused & used way to often in the skincare industry, but we want to change that. When choosing to purchase Bare Bar products, you can trust us that the product you will receive is the real natural deal. Let us walk you through the Bare Bar difference & put a spotlight on the ingredients we use within our products that are loved by tens of thousands of valued customers. Key Ingredients Coconut Oil A natural detoxifier that’s rich in fatty acids and super efficient at removing grime from your skin. Coconut oil also soothes the skin, helps to reduce inflammation and is ultra hydrating. Go nuts! Natural Exfoliants Oatmeal, Coffee Grounds, Volcanic Pumice Stone and Rock Sea Salt are just some of the Natural Exfoliants we use in our Soap bars. They rid your skin of grime and dirt after a hard days work, but also leave your skin soft & replenished Citrus Essential Oil Essential Oils are the distillation of plants, which provide our products with their scent, they boost your mood and help reduce stress. We add citrus essential oils to our soap bars for a touch of freshness and some extra zing. Our soaps wouldn’t be the same without them! Cocoa Butter A fruit seed butter that's packed with vitamins and fatty acids like Linoleic, Oleic, Stearic and Palmitic Acid – which are all excellent at nourishing the skin and make our soap perfect for your skin Shea Butter can also help to protect your skin from harmful UV rays RSPO Sustainable Palm Oil We only ever use palm oil that is RSPO Certified Sustainable, making our soap as Sustainable as possible is key for us at bare bar. It works wonders with coconut oil to help our soaps produce our iconic rich lather and also helps our soap bars to last longer. Sustainable Palm farming helps local communities earn a living through good practices Natural Mineral Clay We utilize the power of the earth by adding natural clays such as Kaolin Clay & Natural Coloured Mineral Clays to make our Soap products look great, but to also help draw out impurities within your skin, which also helps to balance the moisture of your skin The Bare Bar Difference! Experience the difference of our Natural Handcrafted Soap Bars, meticulously made in the UK with these premium ingredients. Each bar embodies the essence of nature's gifts, nourishing your skin with care and luxury. Discover the magic of a Cold Process soap, and let your skin revel in the goodness of natural soap.
